properties.address: Banham Community Centre, Banham, Norfolk NR16 2HB
properties.description: The space is open to all throughout the year as a community cafe but functions as a warm space during winter months when we extend our opening time to 1pm and serve warming soup and a roll. It is a vibrant and welcoming space open to all ages. We open every Wednesday.
properties.title: Banham Community Centre

properties.address: Harling Old School Hal, EAST HARLING, United Kingdom NR16 2LU 2LU
properties.description: Weekly hub in the centrally located, spacious and warm Old School Hall, the village hub
properties.title: East Harling Welcome Hub

properties.description: A free children's clothes bank open Tues and Fri mornings. Free comfortable warm space to stay and play with free warm refreshments.
properties.title: Growkids Clothes Bank

properties.description: A weekly mindfulness cafe offering free hot drinks, good food and a range of mindfulness activities from badminton to colouring. Come join us! Starting 19th December 2023 All very welcome.
properties.title: Mindfulness Cafe

properties.address: The Salvation Army, Thetford, Norfolk IP24 2BN IP24 2BN
properties.description: We cater for all ages . Enjoy time to chat, play board games or be creative with a wide selection of crafts. We also provide a listening ear and practical support from making phone calls filling in forms or learning to use a lap top.

hours._text: Tuesday: 09:30 - 12:00, Wednesday: 10:00 - 02:30 Fortnightly, Thursday: 09:30 - 12:00, Friday: 09:30 - 12:00, Saturday: 09:30 - 12:00

properties.title: Sally Ann's Lounge

properties.address: Norfolk County Council, Thetford, Norfolk IP24 2EA
properties.description: You can access most Libraries outside staffed hours with “Open Library” providing extra access to the library, its books and computers. Check if it's currently available at your local library at www.norfolk.gov.uk/openlibrary Free hot drinks available, please see our What’s On page or ask in the library for times: https://www.norfolk.gov.uk/libraries-local-history-and-archives/libraries/whats-on
properties.title: Thetford Library

properties.address: Ancient House Museum, Thetford, Norfolk IP24 1AD
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 4th December 2024** Join us for Warm Wednesdays at the Museum, we will be running two sessions from 10.30-12.30 and from 1.30pm-3.30pm every Wednesday from December-March. Come along for a chat, refreshments and enjoy time within our galleries. We look forward to welcoming you!
properties.title: Warm Wednesdays at Ancient House
